column4: i guess ubuntu uses lilo as bootscreen right?

universe is a place where unsupported stuff lives, but stuff you want.  mp3 encoders/decoders, etc.
Multiverse is the same, only mirrored less, things like a full mplayer, codecs, etc are in multiverse
